description: Me, when faced with nearly any problem: Well, uh, I could make some... graphics about it”
I keep asking my friends what brings them joy and they keep naming the thing that makes them money that they hate the least that contains exactly zero joy, thats weird
pioneering a new design style I am calling 3d for no reason”

13 years ago I was accepted to SUNY Purchase, where I would have focused on graphic design. Instead, I promptly accepted a job as a staff designer at a startup in California, put all my belongings in my Honda Element and drove across the country to San Francisco with my best friend – never looked back
I found the needle of a dirty PAC donation in the haystack of a local politician’s campaign donations; time to go to bed
the union was like we represent workers who handle waste and hazardous materials and the Catholic high school teachers were like well fit right in”
By calling your enemies barbarians for decades, you justify your actual barbarism with a fiction you yourself created, and everyone can see it but you
